The 'SNES Advantage' is a large joystick produced by Asciiware, sold for the
Super Nintendo Entertainment System. The device is meant to rest at a
comfortable level on a flat surfaceâsuch as a tabletop or the floorâwhile the
player sits behind it, but it can also used while resting on a players lap. The
controller was designed to be used like an arcade game joystick and featured
larger action buttons than the standard SNES controller. It is used with both
hands, one for the joystick and the other to manipulate the buttons.
